word: PERHAPS NOWHERE ELSE IN THE BIBLE DO WE HAVE SUCH A COMPREHENSIVE SUMMARY OF CHRISTIAN EDUCATION AND CHILD DEVELOPMENT. ELLEN WHITE IS CAREFUL NOT TO MAKE PETER'S COUNSEL INTO A FORMULA TO BE MASTERED BY FORCE OF WILL. INSTEAD, EACH VIRTUE IS DEALT WITH AS AN ASPECT OF PERSONALITY DEVELOPMENT. ELLEN WHITE'S COMMENTS REPRESENT A NUTSHELL DESCRIPTION OF THE PROCESS OF CHARACTER DEVELOPMENT OR OF THE PHILOSOPHY OF ADVENTIST CHILD CARE AND EDUCATION.
